title: User signup with valid data and trial initiation
description: Verify that a new user can successfully sign up with valid email, phone, and password, initiating a trial with optional upfront fee logic.

steps.description: Navigate to signup page
Input valid email, phone number, and password
Submit the signup form
Verify signup success response with trial initiation
Confirm email/phone verification process is triggered

title: User signup failure with invalid email format
description: Verify that signup fails when an invalid email format is submitted.

steps.description: Navigate to signup page
Input invalid email format with valid phone and password
Submit the signup form
Verify response with validation error for email format

title: User login success with valid credentials
description: Verify that a user can log in successfully with correct username/email and password.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Input valid username/email and password
Submit login form
Verify login success and session creation

title: User login failure with incorrect password
description: Verify login fails with invalid password and appropriate error is returned.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Input valid username/email and incorrect password
Submit login form
Verify login failure response with invalid credentials error

title: Login blocked due to IP whitelist enforcement
description: Verify that login is blocked and access denied if user IP is not in whitelist after authentication.

steps.description: Attempt login from an IP address not in whitelist
Input valid credentials
Submit login form
Verify access forbidden (403) due to IP whitelist enforcement

title: POS checkout normal flow
description: Verify a complete POS checkout process with barcode scanning, discount application, multiple payment methods, receipt generation, and inventory update.

steps.description: Log in as cashier
Scan multiple items using barcode scanner
Apply valid discount codes to qualifying items
Select payment method (cash and card) and process payment
Verify accurate updated cart total reflecting discounts and taxes
Verify payment success and receipt is generated with correct details
Verify inventory quantities decremented appropriately in real time

title: POS checkout with duplicate sale idempotency key
description: Ensure that submitting the same sale with identical idempotency key is rejected to prevent duplicate sales.

steps.description: Perform a sale with a unique idempotency key
Resubmit the same sale payload with identical idempotency key
Verify the duplicate sale is rejected with an appropriate error message

title: Inventory management CRUD operations per store
description: Verify inventory creation, reading, updating, and deleting at store level including correct stock tracking.

steps.description: Authenticate as manager with permissions for store
Create new inventory product and assign quantity
Verify product is created successfully and listed under inventory
Update quantity of the inventory item
Verify inventory quantity is updated correctly
Delete inventory item
Verify product is removed from inventory

title: Low stock alert generation in manager dashboard
description: Verify that low stock alerts are generated and visible in the dashboard for inventory below threshold.

steps.description: Set low stock threshold for a product in store inventory
Reduce inventory quantity below threshold via sales or manual update
Verify alert is triggered and displayed in manager dashboard

title: CSV inventory import with valid data
description: Verify import of inventory data from CSV file with valid schema and data results in successful update.

steps.description: Download CSV inventory template
Populate CSV with valid inventory data
Upload CSV file to inventory import endpoint
Verify all rows are imported successfully with updated inventory counts

title: CSV inventory import rejects malformed rows with error
description: Verify that CSV imports with malformed rows are rejected with clear validation error messages specifying rows and issues.

steps.description: Prepare CSV file with some rows missing required fields or incorrect formats
Upload CSV file to inventory import endpoint
Verify rejection response with detailed error messages highlighting malformed rows

title: Role-based access control enforcement for restricted APIs
description: Verify that users without required roles receive 403 Forbidden when accessing restricted endpoints like store admin operations.

steps.description: Authenticate as cashier user
Attempt to access store admin-only API endpoints
Verify access is denied with 403 Forbidden

title: Customer loyalty points increment and redemption validation
description: Verify loyalty points increase correctly after transactions and redemption prevents overdrawing points.

steps.description: Complete transaction for customer and earn loyalty points
Verify customer loyalty points balance increments accordingly
Attempt to redeem more points than balance
Verify redemption is rejected with insufficient points error

title: Subscription payment initialization and verification
description: Verify subscription payments are initialized correctly via supported providers and payment verification works for success and failure cases.

steps.description: Initialize subscription payment with valid plan via Paystack or Flutterwave
Verify payment initialization is successful and returns payment reference
Verify payment using correct reference after payment completes
Verify payment verification returns success
Verify payment using invalid/failed payment reference
Verify payment verification returns failure

title: Subscription webhook signature validation and idempotent processing
description: Verify webhook handlers validate signatures from Paystack and Flutterwave and respond idempotently to duplicate webhook events.

steps.description: Send valid webhook event with correct signature to Paystack webhook endpoint
Verify webhook event accepted and processed
Send duplicate webhook event with same signature again
Verify webhook handler responds idempotently with success response
Send webhook event with invalid signature
Verify webhook event rejected with error due to signature failure

title: Offline batch upload and download sync operations with conflict resolution
description: Verify the offline synchronization APIs support uploading offline batch sales/inventory data, downloading data for offline use, checking sync status, and resolving conflicts properly.

steps.description: Upload offline batch data via sync upload endpoint
Verify upload is accepted and queued for processing
Download latest offline data via sync download endpoint
Verify data returned matches latest centralized state
Query sync status via sync status endpoint
Verify accurate status including pending uploads or conflicts
Submit conflict resolution data to endpoint
Verify conflicts are resolved as expected and updated state is consistent

title: Security mechanisms operation: session cookies, CSRF, rate limits, CSP
description: Verify security features including session cookies management, CSRF protections on state-changing requests, rate limiting enforcement, and Content Security Policy headers.

steps.description: Perform login and check session cookie properties (HttpOnly, Secure, SameSite)
Verify session cookies set correctly with security flags
Submit state-changing requests without CSRF tokens
Verify request is rejected due to CSRF protection
Perform a high volume of API requests within short period
Verify rate limits are applied and excess requests are rejected
Inspect response headers for Content Security Policy presence
Verify CSP headers are correctly set

title: Observability health check and metrics reporting
description: Verify observability endpoints return accurate system health, database latency, security event logs, performance metrics, and allow configuration management.

steps.description: Request health check endpoint
Verify system health status is returned with database connectivity and uptime
Request system metrics endpoint as admin
Verify system metrics such as latency and throughput data are returned
Request security events logs endpoint
Verify logs include recent security events like failed logins or CSRF violations
Request configuration overview endpoint
Verify current system configuration is accurately reflected

title: AI-powered features accessibility with feature flags
description: Verify that AI chat, insight cards, and forecasting models are only available and registered when the AI feature flag is enabled.

steps.description: Set AI feature flag off in system config
Attempt to access AI-powered API routes
Verify AI endpoints return 404 or not registered errors
Enable AI feature flag
Access AI-enabled chat and forecasting endpoints
Verify AI features respond correctly with expected AI-generated content
